record.title: MEASURES READ THE FIRST TIME--S. 3036 AND S. 3044
record.narrative:
MEASURES READ THE FIRST TIME--S. 3036 AND S. 3044 -- (Senate - May 20, 2008)

[Page: S4556]

speaking.paragraph: I understand there are two bills at the desk. I ask for their first reading en bloc.

record.chair: The clerk will report the bills by title:
record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:
A bill (S. 3036) to direct the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to establish a program to decrease emissions of greenhouse gases, and for other purposes.
A bill (S. 3044) to provide energy price relief and hold oil companies and other entities accountable for their actions with regard to high energy prices, and for other purposes.

speaking.paragraph: I now ask for their second reading en bloc and object to my own requests en bloc.

record.chair: The bills will be read for the second time on the next legislative day.
